duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing automotive repairs and services following BSRO procedures and guidelines.
Conducting vehicle inspections and explaining mechanical diagnoses and needed repairs to customers.
Maintaining service center standards, cleanliness, and compliance with safety requirements.
Performing tire, wheel, brake, fluid, and oil services, and handling physical demands associated with these tasks.
Attending meetings, providing on-the-job training, and assisting with other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license, minimum 2 years of automotive repair experience or completion of Vocational-Technical School program, and A.S.E. certification in at least one of A1-A8 (preferred) or equivalent external qualifications/training certifications.
